title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, sauté pancetta in a pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk egg, yolk, and grated Pecorino Romano with plenty of black pepper.
Drain the spaghetti, reserving some pasta water. Add the spaghetti to the pan with pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly pour in the egg mixture, tossing vigorously to create a creamy sauce. Add some pasta water if needed.
Serve immediately, topped with more grated cheese and black pepper.
fullDescription: A rich and satisfying pasta dish that is quick to prepare.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
ingredients: 500g boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into chunks
instructions: In a bowl, mix yogurt, lemon juice, ginger-garlic paste, garam masala, cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, and chili powder (if using). Add chicken and marinate for at least 30 minutes.
Preheat oven or grill. Cook chicken until lightly charred.
Heat oil in a pan, add chopped onion and sauté until golden brown.
Add minced garlic and grated ginger, cook for a minute.
Stir in crushed tomatoes and cook until the sauce thickens.
Add the cooked chicken to the sauce. Simmer for 5-10 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream and garam masala. Cook for another 2 minutes.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot with rice or naan.
fullDescription: A popular and flavorful Indian curry dish.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic homemade cookies with plenty of delicious chocolate chips.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a large bowl, cream together the softened butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla extract.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined. Do not overmix.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
Let cool on the baking sheets for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
fullDescription: Warm, gooey, and perfect for satisfying your sweet tooth.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy dish with a colorful mix of stir-fried vegetables.
instructions: Heat vegetable oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat.
Add sliced onion and cook until slightly softened.
Add minced garlic and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add bell pepper and carrot, stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Add broccoli florets and snow peas, stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes until crisp-tender.
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce and oyster sauce (if using). Pour over the vegetables.
Stir in sesame oil.
Serve hot over cooked rice.
fullDescription: A versatile and nutritious meal that can be customized with your favorite vegetables.
